content: Your words made my heart swell. Though I’ve experienced death of loved ones, forgetfulness is a whole other beast of tragedy, and I appreciate you sharing not only your memories, but also your transformation of perspective. How you were able to see yourself as not just a boy who lost his grandfather, but as a lieutenant with intel to share with his commander, and that one day we’ll all be able to say: Thank God you had that intel. -T.
